answer: The properties of host galaxies of radio-loud and radio-quiet quasars provide background information for understanding the origin of radio loudness, suggesting areas for future research (astro-ph/0103238).
explanation: This paper reviews our knowledge of the properties of the host galaxies of radio-loud and radio-quiet quasars, providing a comprehensive understanding of the origin of radio loudness.
evidence_quote: host galaxies of radio-loud and radio-quiet quasars
